articleContentTranslated: 13 points and eleven rebounds were personal bests of the season as well as three blocks. In addition, the center recorded three assists and one steal in his 29:42 minutes.
San Antonio had a lot of trouble with the Rockets, which only had the number of eight players necessary to play.

The revenge for the 105: 109 on Thursday was achieved thanks to a strong defense after the break and especially in the final section.PÃ¶ltl for Popovich "Star of the game" "We didn't hit much and were behind at halftime, but turned the game with a very good defense" said PÃ¶ltl.

"We played our best defense in the fourth quarter," said coach Gregg Popovich. The 72-year-old confirmed that his Austrian center was the â€œstar of the gameâ€. San Antonio was led by DeMar DeRozan (24 points) in their seventh win in their 13th game of the season.
Dejounte Murray (18 points, ten rebounds) wrote, like PÃ¶ltl, in double double digits.

The Texans will be performing at the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday, and Harden's brilliant Nets debut James Harden made an outstanding debut for his new team after the sensational move from the Houston Rockets to the Brooklyn Nets.

At 122: 115 against Orlando Magic, Harden got a triple double with 32 points, twelve rebounds and 14 assists. This makes "The Beard" the first player in club history to make his debut with a triple-double.

The top scorer of the Nets, who had risen to become title contenders, was Kevin Durant with a personal best of 42 points for the season. RECAP ğŸ“ @ JHarden13 records a triple-double in his Brooklyn debut as the Nets top the Magic https:

//t.co/SYCXME64pwâ€” Brooklyn Nets (@BrooklynNets) January 17, 2021 The third player from the star trio, Kyrie Irving, is not yet eligible to play due to his violation of the NBA's coronavirus rules. :

"If we can stand together in the square, the hours will be terrifying," said Harden. He had come to the Nets in a swap deal that consisted of four teams and had only received clearance to play hours before the game against the Magic.
The 31-year-old has not yet trained with his new team, National Basketball Association
